body: Hello guys, I'm Key, a new player in this community. I've been playing on my favorite mini-game on this server, Nebula. I really love PvPing and the challenge of trying to get that obsidian block. I feel it teaches us perseverance, determination and great sportsmanship. Not only that, after the games we play, we make friends! Well, enough of my lecture. Hello everyone, nice to meet you!
body_tagged: Hello guys, I'm Key, a new player in this community. I've been playing on my favorite mini-game on this server, Nebula. I really love PvPing and the challenge of trying to get that obsidian block. I feel it teaches us perseverance, determination and great sportsmanship. Not only that, after the games we play, we make friends! Well, enough of my lecture. Hello everyone, nice to meet you!
title: Hello, Key here!

replies.body:
The good sportsmanship on this player is real.
Great guy; welcome KeyCrafter! :D

If you need any assistance, feel free to contact any of the staff members on skype. We'll be more than happy to help you out! :)
